name: New Gutsy Gobbo
description:
GUTSY GOBBO 

Grab the Golden Idol and escape the ruins!

University Project by Corey E and George W

Game Music by BlueBeats

Controls

Left/Right Keys - Movement

Up Key - Climb Ladder

Down Key - Fall Through Platform

C Key - Crouch

Space Key - Jump

Z  Key - Open/Close Sign

Esc Key - Open/Close Pause Menu

Return Key - Select Option

E Key - Exit Game
